item.title: Advanced Plots in R
item.description: Enter your Email Here to receive notifications when new content is posted. Let‚Äôs Dive Into an Example I‚Äôd like to share a technique using str_glue() that I learned from Matt Dancho, a Data-Science instructor at Business Science University. Check out my favorite course here: Business Analysis With R. str_glue() from the stringr library is one of my favorite functions in R - It‚Äôs super helpful for wrangling and manipulating text in preparation for building advanced plots.

item.title: About
item.description: CONTEXT My name is Jason Dexter and I’m an R-Programmer and Data-Analyst based out of Berkeley, CA, where I live with my lovely wife üíÉ and our two cats üêà üêà In graduate school I was introduced to programming, first base-R then Python. The idea üí° of solving problems programmatically resonated deeply with me and I’ve been hooked ever since. I’m a nerd ü§ì when it comes to automating data manipulation - there’s something intoxicating about the process of wrangling data using code, it’s simply amazing!
